documentID1.description: Adusa, also known as Malabar Nut, is used in treating cough, asthma, and bronchitis. It is a herb that grows in tropical regions and prefers full sun exposure.

documentID2.description: Pineapple is a tropical fruit known for its high vitamin C content. It helps in treating sore throat, diabetes, heart disease, and obesity.

documentID3.description: Ashwagandha is a powerful adaptogen known for its stress-relieving and energy-boosting properties. It thrives in well-drained, sandy soil under full sun.

documentID4.description: Neem is a versatile medicinal plant known for its antibacterial, antifungal, and anti-inflammatory properties. It is widely used in skincare and for boosting immunity.

documentID5.description: Brahmi is an herb known for enhancing memory, cognitive function, and reducing anxiety. It grows well in damp, marshy conditions with partial shade.

documentID6.description: Giloy is a well-known herb in Ayurveda for boosting immunity and treating chronic fevers and diabetes. It prefers moderate watering and full sunlight.

documentID7.description: Tulsi, also known as Holy Basil, is a sacred plant in India known for its medicinal properties, especially in treating respiratory issues and boosting immunity.

documentID8.description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its healing properties, particularly in skincare and digestive health. It grows best in well-drained, sandy soil with full sun.

documentID9.description: Arjuna is a tree known for its strong heart-protective properties, often used in traditional medicine to manage blood pressure and cholesterol levels.

documentID10.description: Fenugreek is an herb widely used in cooking and traditional medicine for its digestive and blood sugar-lowering benefits.

documentID11.description: Shatavari is a rejuvenating herb in Ayurveda, known for supporting women's health, boosting immunity, and promoting digestion.

documentID14.description: Guggul is a resin obtained from the Indian Bdellium tree, used in Ayurvedic medicine to treat high cholesterol, arthritis, and skin disorders.
